name: Feature request
about: Use this template to propose new features or enhancements
labels: enhancement, triage

---

## Summary / Resumo

- **What are you proposing? / O que você está propondo?**

## Motivation / Motivação

- **Why is this needed? / Por que isso é necessário?**

## User story / História do usuário

- As a [user type], I want [capability], so that [benefit].

## Proposed solution / Solução proposta

- Describe the suggested implementation or approach. / Descreva a implementação ou abordagem sugerida.

## Acceptance criteria / Critérios de aceitação

- [ ] Clear description of expected behavior
- [ ] Tests or validation steps described
- [ ] Backwards-compatible or migration steps documented (if applicable)

## Design & mockups (optional) / Design & mockups (opcional)

- Attach images, links, or ASCII diagrams

## Alternatives considered / Alternativas consideradas

- Short summary of other approaches considered and why they were rejected

## Additional context / Contexto adicional

- Any relevant files, logs, or environment details

## Triage checklist / Checklist de triagem

- [ ] Business value explained
- [ ] Minimal viable scope defined
- [ ] Potential risks identified
